40#else
41#include <user_ip6_var.h>
42#endif
43#endif

45#include <netinet/sctp_var.h>
46#include <netinet/sctp_pcb.h>
47#include <netinet/sctp_input.h>
48#if 0

53#endif

56#endif
57#endif

62/* local macros and datatypes used to get IP addresses system independently */
63#if !defined(IP_PKTINFO) && !defined(IP_RECVDSTADDR)
64# error "Can't determine socket option to use to get UDP IP"
65#endif
66
67void recv_thread_destroy(void);
68
69#define MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN 128
70
71#define ROUNDUP(a, size) (((a) & ((size)-1)) ? (1 + ((a) | ((size)-1))) : (a))
72
73#if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__DragonFly__) || defined(__FreeBSD__)
74#define NEXT_SA(ap) ap = (struct sockaddr *) \
75 ((caddr_t) ap + (ap->sa_len ? ROUNDUP(ap->sa_len, sizeof (uint32_t)) : sizeof(uint32_t)))
76#endif
77
78#if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__DragonFly__) || defined(__FreeBSD__)
79static void
80sctp_get_rtaddrs(int addrs, struct sockaddr *sa, struct sockaddr **rti_info)
81{
82 int i;
83
84 for (i = 0; i < RTAX_MAX; i++) {
85 if (addrs & (1 << i)) {
86 rti_info[i] = sa;
87 NEXT_SA(sa);
88 } else {
89 rti_info[i] = NULL;
90 }
91 }
92}
93
94static void
95sctp_handle_ifamsg(unsigned char type, unsigned short index, struct sockaddr *sa)
96{
97 int rc;
98 struct ifaddrs *ifa, *ifas;
99
100 /* handle only the types we want */
101 if ((type != RTM_NEWADDR) && (type != RTM_DELADDR)) {
102 return;
103 }
104
105 rc = getifaddrs(&ifas);
106 if (rc != 0) {
107 return;
108 }
109 for (ifa = ifas; ifa; ifa = ifa->ifa_next) {
110 if (index == if_nametoindex(ifa->ifa_name)) {
111 break;
112 }
113 }
114 if (ifa == NULL) {
115 freeifaddrs(ifas);
116 return;
117 }
118
119 /* relay the appropriate address change to the base code */
120 if (type == RTM_NEWADDR) {
121 (void)sctp_add_addr_to_vrf(SCTP_DEFAULT_VRFID,
122 NULL,
123 if_nametoindex(ifa->ifa_name),
124 0,
125 ifa->ifa_name,
126 NULL,
127 sa,
128 0,
129 1);
130 } else {
131 sctp_del_addr_from_vrf(SCTP_DEFAULT_VRFID, ifa->ifa_addr,
132 if_nametoindex(ifa->ifa_name),
133 ifa->ifa_name);
134 }
135 freeifaddrs(ifas);
136}
137
138static void *
139recv_function_route(void *arg)
140{
141 ssize_t ret;
142 struct ifa_msghdr *ifa;
143 char rt_buffer[1024];
144 struct sockaddr *sa, *rti_info[RTAX_MAX];
145
146 sctp_userspace_set_threadname("SCTP addr mon");
147
148 while (1) {
149 memset(rt_buffer, 0, sizeof(rt_buffer));
150 ret = recv(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route), rt_buffer, sizeof(rt_buffer), 0);
151
152 if (ret > 0) {
153 ifa = (struct ifa_msghdr *) rt_buffer;
154 if (ifa->ifam_type != RTM_DELADDR && ifa->ifam_type != RTM_NEWADDR) {
155 continue;
156 }
157 sa = (struct sockaddr *) (ifa + 1);
158 sctp_get_rtaddrs(ifa->ifam_addrs, sa, rti_info);
159 switch (ifa->ifam_type) {
160 case RTM_DELADDR:
161 case RTM_NEWADDR:
162 sctp_handle_ifamsg(ifa->ifam_type, ifa->ifam_index, rti_info[RTAX_IFA]);
163 break;
164 default:
165 /* ignore this routing event */
166 break;
167 }
168 }
169 if (ret < 0) {
170 if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EINTR) {
171 continue;
172 } else {
173 break;
174 }
175 }
176 }
177 return (NULL);
178}
179#endif
180
181#if 0
182/* This does not yet work on Linux */
183static void *
184recv_function_route(void *arg)
185{
186 int len;
187 char buf[4096];
188 struct iovec iov = { buf, sizeof(buf) };
189 struct msghdr msg;
190 struct nlmsghdr *nh;
191 struct ifaddrmsg *rtmsg;
192 struct rtattr *rtatp;
193 struct in_addr *inp;
194 struct sockaddr_nl sanl;
195#ifdef INET
196 struct sockaddr_in *sa;
197#endif
198#ifdef INET6
199 struct sockaddr_in6 *sa6;
200#endif
201
202 for (;;) {
203 memset(&sanl, 0, sizeof(sanl));
204 sanl.nl_family = AF_NETLINK;
205 sanl.nl_groups = RTMGRP_IPV6_IFADDR | RTMGRP_IPV4_IFADDR;
206 memset(&msg, 0, sizeof(struct msghdr));
207 msg.msg_name = (void *)&sanl;
208 msg.msg_namelen = sizeof(sanl);
209 msg.msg_iov = &iov;
210 msg.msg_iovlen = 1;
211 msg.msg_control = NULL;
212 msg.msg_controllen = 0;
213
214 len = recvmsg(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route), &msg, 0);
215
216 if (len < 0) {
217 if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EINTR) {
218 continue;
219 } else {
220 break;
221 }
222 }
223 for (nh = (struct nlmsghdr *) buf; NLMSG_OK (nh, len);
224 nh = NLMSG_NEXT (nh, len)) {
225 if (nh->nlmsg_type == NLMSG_DONE)
226 break;
227
228 if (nh->nlmsg_type == RTM_NEWADDR || nh->nlmsg_type == RTM_DELADDR) {
229 rtmsg = (struct ifaddrmsg *)NLMSG_DATA(nh);
230 rtatp = (struct rtattr *)IFA_RTA(rtmsg);
231 if (rtatp->rta_type == IFA_ADDRESS) {
232 inp = (struct in_addr *)RTA_DATA(rtatp);
233 switch (rtmsg->ifa_family) {
234#ifdef INET
235 case AF_INET:
236 sa = (struct sockaddr_in *)malloc(sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
237 sa->sin_family = rtmsg->ifa_family;
238 sa->sin_port = 0;
239 memcpy(&sa->sin_addr, inp, sizeof(struct in_addr));
240 sctp_handle_ifamsg(nh->nlmsg_type, rtmsg->ifa_index, (struct sockaddr *)sa);
241 break;
242#endif
243#ifdef INET6
244 case AF_INET6:
245 sa6 = (struct sockaddr_in6 *)malloc(sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
246 sa6->sin6_family = rtmsg->ifa_family;
247 sa6->sin6_port = 0;
248 memcpy(&sa6->sin6_addr, inp, sizeof(struct in6_addr));
249 sctp_handle_ifamsg(nh->nlmsg_type, rtmsg->ifa_index, (struct sockaddr *)sa6);
250 break;
251#endif
252 default:
253 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Address family %d not supported.\n", rtmsg->ifa_family);
254 break;
255 }
256 }
257 }
258 }
259 }
260 return (NULL);
261}
262#endif
263
264#ifdef INET
265static void *
266recv_function_raw(void *arg)
267{
268 struct mbuf **recvmbuf;
269 struct ip *iphdr;
270 struct sctphdr *sh;
271 uint16_t port;
272 int offset, ecn = 0;
273 int compute_crc = 1;
274 struct sctp_chunkhdr *ch;
275 struct sockaddr_in src, dst;
276#if !defined(_WIN32)
277 unsigned int ncounter;
278 struct msghdr msg;
279 struct iovec recv_iovec[MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN];
280#else
281 WSABUF recv_iovec[MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN];
282 int nResult, m_ErrorCode;
283 DWORD flags;
284 DWORD ncounter;
285 struct sockaddr_in from;
286 int fromlen;
287#endif
288 /*Initially the entire set of mbufs is to be allocated.
289 to_fill indicates this amount. */
290 int to_fill = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
291 /* iovlen is the size of each mbuf in the chain */
292 int i, n;
293 unsigned int iovlen = MCLBYTES;
294 int want_ext = (iovlen > MLEN)? 1 : 0;
295 int want_header = 0;
296
297 sctp_userspace_set_threadname("SCTP/IP4 rcv");
298
299 memset(&src, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
300 memset(&dst, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
301
302 recvmbuf = malloc(sizeof(struct mbuf *) * MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN);
303
304 while (1) {
305 for (i = 0; i < to_fill; i++) {
306 /* Not getting the packet header. Tests with chain of one run
307 as usual without having the packet header.
308 Have tried both sending and receiving
309 */
310 recvmbuf[i] = sctp_get_mbuf_for_msg(iovlen, want_header, M_NOWAIT, want_ext, MT_DATA);
311#if !defined(_WIN32)
312 recv_iovec[i].iov_base = (caddr_t)recvmbuf[i]->m_data;
313 recv_iovec[i].iov_len = iovlen;
314#else
315 recv_iovec[i].buf = (caddr_t)recvmbuf[i]->m_data;
316 recv_iovec[i].len = iovlen;
317#endif
318 }
319 to_fill = 0;
320#if defined(_WIN32)
321 flags = 0;
322 ncounter = 0;
323 fromlen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
324 memset(&from, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
325
326 nResult = WSARecvFrom(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp), recv_iovec, MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN, &ncounter, &flags, (struct sockaddr *)&from, &fromlen, NULL, NULL);
327 if (nResult != 0) {
328 m_ErrorCode = WSAGetLastError();
329 if ((m_ErrorCode == WSAENOTSOCK) || (m_ErrorCode == WSAEINTR)) {
330 break;
331 }
332 continue;
333 }
334 n = ncounter;
335#else
336 memset(&msg, 0, sizeof(struct msghdr));
337 msg.msg_name = NULL;
338 msg.msg_namelen = 0;
339 msg.msg_iov = recv_iovec;
340 msg.msg_iovlen = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
341 msg.msg_control = NULL;
342 msg.msg_controllen = 0;
343 ncounter = n = recvmsg(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp), &msg, 0);
344 if (n < 0) {
345 if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EINTR) {
346 continue;
347 } else {
348 break;
349 }
350 }
351#endif
352 SCTP_HEADER_LEN(recvmbuf[0]) = n; /* length of total packet */
353 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvpackets);
354 SCTP_STAT_INCR_COUNTER64(sctps_inpackets);
355
356 if ((unsigned int)n <= iovlen) {
357 SCTP_BUF_LEN(recvmbuf[0]) = n;
358 (to_fill)++;
359 } else {
360 i = 0;
361 SCTP_BUF_LEN(recvmbuf[0]) = iovlen;
362
363 ncounter -= min(ncounter, iovlen);
364 (to_fill)++;
365 do {
366 recvmbuf[i]->m_next = recvmbuf[i+1];
367 SCTP_BUF_LEN(recvmbuf[i]->m_next) = min(ncounter, iovlen);
368 i++;
369 ncounter -= min(ncounter, iovlen);
370 (to_fill)++;
371 } while (ncounter > 0);
372 }
373
374 offset = sizeof(struct ip) + sizeof(struct sctphdr) + sizeof(struct sctp_chunkhdr);
375 if (SCTP_BUF_LEN(recvmbuf[0]) < offset) {
376 if ((recvmbuf[0] = m_pullup(recvmbuf[0], offset)) == NULL) {
377 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_hdrops);
378 continue;
379 }
380 }
381 iphdr = mtod(recvmbuf[0], struct ip *);
382 sh = (struct sctphdr *)((caddr_t)iphdr + sizeof(struct ip));
383 ch = (struct sctp_chunkhdr *)((caddr_t)sh + sizeof(struct sctphdr));
384 offset -= sizeof(struct sctp_chunkhdr);
385
386 if (iphdr->ip_tos != 0) {
387 ecn = iphdr->ip_tos & 0x03;
388 }
389
390 dst.sin_family = AF_INET;
391#ifdef HAVE_SIN_LEN
392 dst.sin_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
393#endif
394 dst.sin_addr = iphdr->ip_dst;
395 dst.sin_port = sh->dest_port;
396
397 src.sin_family = AF_INET;
398#ifdef HAVE_SIN_LEN
399 src.sin_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
400#endif
401 src.sin_addr = iphdr->ip_src;
402 src.sin_port = sh->src_port;
403
404 /* SCTP does not allow broadcasts or multicasts */
405 if (IN_MULTICAST(ntohl(dst.sin_addr.s_addr))) {
406 m_freem(recvmbuf[0]);
407 continue;
408 }
409 if (SCTP_IS_IT_BROADCAST(dst.sin_addr, recvmbuf[0])) {
410 m_freem(recvmbuf[0]);
411 continue;
412 }
413
414 port = 0;
415
416 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_no_csum_on_loopback) &&
417 ((IN4_ISLOOPBACK_ADDRESS(&src.sin_addr) &&
418 IN4_ISLOOPBACK_ADDRESS(&dst.sin_addr)) ||
419 (src.sin_addr.s_addr == dst.sin_addr.s_addr))) {
420 compute_crc = 0;
421 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvhwcrc);
422 } else {
423 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvswcrc);
424 }
425 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "%s: Received %d bytes.", __func__, n);
426 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, " - calling sctp_common_input_processing with off=%d\n", offset);
427 sctp_common_input_processing(&recvmbuf[0], sizeof(struct ip), offset, n,
428 (struct sockaddr *)&src,
429 (struct sockaddr *)&dst,
430 sh, ch,
431 compute_crc,
432 ecn,
433 SCTP_DEFAULT_VRFID, port);
434 if (recvmbuf[0]) {
435 m_freem(recvmbuf[0]);
436 }
437 }
438 for (i = 0; i < MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN; i++) {
439 m_free(recvmbuf[i]);
440 }
441 /* free the array itself */
442 free(recvmbuf);
443 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "%s: Exiting SCTP/IP4 rcv\n", __func__);
444 return (NULL);
445}
446#endif
447
448#if defined(INET6)
449static void *
450recv_function_raw6(void *arg)
451{
452 struct mbuf **recvmbuf6;
453#if !defined(_WIN32)
454 unsigned int ncounter = 0;
455 struct iovec recv_iovec[MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN];
456 struct msghdr msg;
457 struct cmsghdr *cmsgptr;
458 char cmsgbuf[CMSG_SPACE(sizeof (struct in6_pktinfo))];
459#else
460 WSABUF recv_iovec[MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN];
461 int nResult, m_ErrorCode;
462 DWORD ncounter = 0;
463 struct sockaddr_in6 from;
464 GUID WSARecvMsg_GUID = WSAID_WSARECVMSG;
465 LPFN_WSARECVMSG WSARecvMsg;
466 WSACMSGHDR *cmsgptr;
467 WSAMSG msg;
468 char ControlBuffer[1024];
469#endif
470 struct sockaddr_in6 src, dst;
471 struct sctphdr *sh;
472 int offset;
473 struct sctp_chunkhdr *ch;
474 /*Initially the entire set of mbufs is to be allocated.
475 to_fill indicates this amount. */
476 int to_fill = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
477 /* iovlen is the size of each mbuf in the chain */
478 int i, n;
479 int compute_crc = 1;
480 unsigned int iovlen = MCLBYTES;
481 int want_ext = (iovlen > MLEN)? 1 : 0;
482 int want_header = 0;
483
484 sctp_userspace_set_threadname("SCTP/IP6 rcv");
485
486 recvmbuf6 = malloc(sizeof(struct mbuf *) * MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN);
487
488 for (;;) {
489 for (i = 0; i < to_fill; i++) {
490 /* Not getting the packet header. Tests with chain of one run
491 as usual without having the packet header.
492 Have tried both sending and receiving
493 */
494 recvmbuf6[i] = sctp_get_mbuf_for_msg(iovlen, want_header, M_NOWAIT, want_ext, MT_DATA);
495#if !defined(_WIN32)
496 recv_iovec[i].iov_base = (caddr_t)recvmbuf6[i]->m_data;
497 recv_iovec[i].iov_len = iovlen;
498#else
499 recv_iovec[i].buf = (caddr_t)recvmbuf6[i]->m_data;
500 recv_iovec[i].len = iovlen;
501#endif
502 }
503 to_fill = 0;
504#if defined(_WIN32)
505 ncounter = 0;
506 memset(&from, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
507 nResult = WSAIoctl(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), SIO_GET_EXTENSION_FUNCTION_POINTER,
508 &WSARecvMsg_GUID, sizeof WSARecvMsg_GUID,
509 &WSARecvMsg, sizeof WSARecvMsg,
510 &ncounter, NULL, NULL);
511 if (nResult == 0) {
512 msg.name = (void *)&src;
513 msg.namelen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
514 msg.lpBuffers = recv_iovec;
515 msg.dwBufferCount = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
516 msg.Control.len = sizeof ControlBuffer;
517 msg.Control.buf = ControlBuffer;
518 msg.dwFlags = 0;
519 nResult = WSARecvMsg(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), &msg, &ncounter, NULL, NULL);
520 }
521 if (nResult != 0) {
522 m_ErrorCode = WSAGetLastError();
523 if ((m_ErrorCode == WSAENOTSOCK) || (m_ErrorCode == WSAEINTR)) {
524 break;
525 }
526 continue;
527 }
528 n = ncounter;
529#else
530 memset(&msg, 0, sizeof(struct msghdr));
531 memset(&src, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
532 memset(&dst, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
533 memset(cmsgbuf, 0, CMSG_SPACE(sizeof (struct in6_pktinfo)));
534 msg.msg_name = (void *)&src;
535 msg.msg_namelen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
536 msg.msg_iov = recv_iovec;
537 msg.msg_iovlen = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
538 msg.msg_control = (void *)cmsgbuf;
539 msg.msg_controllen = (socklen_t)CMSG_SPACE(sizeof (struct in6_pktinfo));
540 msg.msg_flags = 0;
541
542 ncounter = n = recvmsg(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), &msg, 0);
543 if (n < 0) {
544 if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EINTR) {
545 continue;
546 } else {
547 break;
548 }
549 }
550#endif
551 SCTP_HEADER_LEN(recvmbuf6[0]) = n; /* length of total packet */
552 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvpackets);
553 SCTP_STAT_INCR_COUNTER64(sctps_inpackets);
554
555 if ((unsigned int)n <= iovlen) {
556 SCTP_BUF_LEN(recvmbuf6[0]) = n;
557 (to_fill)++;
558 } else {
559 i = 0;
560 SCTP_BUF_LEN(recvmbuf6[0]) = iovlen;
561
562 ncounter -= min(ncounter, iovlen);
563 (to_fill)++;
564 do {
565 recvmbuf6[i]->m_next = recvmbuf6[i+1];
566 SCTP_BUF_LEN(recvmbuf6[i]->m_next) = min(ncounter, iovlen);
567 i++;
568 ncounter -= min(ncounter, iovlen);
569 (to_fill)++;
570 } while (ncounter > 0);
571 }
572
573 for (cmsgptr = CMSG_FIRSTHDR(&msg); cmsgptr != NULL; cmsgptr = CMSG_NXTHDR(&msg, cmsgptr)) {
574 if ((cmsgptr->cmsg_level == IPPROTO_IPV6) && (cmsgptr->cmsg_type == IPV6_PKTINFO)) {
575 struct in6_pktinfo * info;
576
577 info = (struct in6_pktinfo *)CMSG_DATA(cmsgptr);
578 memcpy((void *)&dst.sin6_addr, (const void *) &(info->ipi6_addr), sizeof(struct in6_addr));
579 break;
580 }
581 }
582
583 /* SCTP does not allow broadcasts or multicasts */
584 if (IN6_IS_ADDR_MULTICAST(&dst.sin6_addr)) {
585 m_freem(recvmbuf6[0]);
586 continue;
587 }
588
589 offset = sizeof(struct sctphdr) + sizeof(struct sctp_chunkhdr);
590 if (SCTP_BUF_LEN(recvmbuf6[0]) < offset) {
591 if ((recvmbuf6[0] = m_pullup(recvmbuf6[0], offset)) == NULL) {
592 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_hdrops);
593 continue;
594 }
595 }
596 sh = mtod(recvmbuf6[0], struct sctphdr *);
597 ch = (struct sctp_chunkhdr *)((caddr_t)sh + sizeof(struct sctphdr));
598 offset -= sizeof(struct sctp_chunkhdr);
599
600 dst.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
601#ifdef HAVE_SIN6_LEN
602 dst.sin6_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
603#endif
604 dst.sin6_port = sh->dest_port;
605
606 src.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
607#ifdef HAVE_SIN6_LEN
608 src.sin6_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
609#endif
610 src.sin6_port = sh->src_port;
611 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_no_csum_on_loopback) &&
612 (memcmp(&src.sin6_addr, &dst.sin6_addr, sizeof(struct in6_addr)) == 0)) {
613 compute_crc = 0;
614 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvhwcrc);
615 } else {
616 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvswcrc);
617 }
618 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "%s: Received %d bytes.", __func__, n);
619 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, " - calling sctp_common_input_processing with off=%d\n", offset);
620 sctp_common_input_processing(&recvmbuf6[0], 0, offset, n,
621 (struct sockaddr *)&src,
622 (struct sockaddr *)&dst,
623 sh, ch,
624 compute_crc,
625 0,
626 SCTP_DEFAULT_VRFID, 0);
627 if (recvmbuf6[0]) {
628 m_freem(recvmbuf6[0]);
629 }
630 }
631 for (i = 0; i < MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN; i++) {
632 m_free(recvmbuf6[i]);
633 }
634 /* free the array itself */
635 free(recvmbuf6);
636 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "%s: Exiting SCTP/IP6 rcv\n", __func__);
637 return (NULL);
638}
639#endif
640
641#ifdef INET
642static void *
643recv_function_udp(void *arg)
644{
645 struct mbuf **udprecvmbuf;
646 /*Initially the entire set of mbufs is to be allocated.
647 to_fill indicates this amount. */
648 int to_fill = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
649 /* iovlen is the size of each mbuf in the chain */
650 int i, n, offset;
651 unsigned int iovlen = MCLBYTES;
652 int want_ext = (iovlen > MLEN)? 1 : 0;
653 int want_header = 0;
654 struct sctphdr *sh;
655 uint16_t port;
656 struct sctp_chunkhdr *ch;
657 struct sockaddr_in src, dst;
658#if defined(IP_PKTINFO)
659 char cmsgbuf[CMSG_SPACE(sizeof(struct in_pktinfo))];
660#else
661 char cmsgbuf[CMSG_SPACE(sizeof(struct in_addr))];
662#endif
663 int compute_crc = 1;
664#if !defined(_WIN32)
665 unsigned int ncounter;
666 struct iovec iov[MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN];
667 struct msghdr msg;
668 struct cmsghdr *cmsgptr;
669#else
670 GUID WSARecvMsg_GUID = WSAID_WSARECVMSG;
671 LPFN_WSARECVMSG WSARecvMsg;
672 char ControlBuffer[1024];
673 WSABUF iov[MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN];
674 WSAMSG msg;
675 int nResult, m_ErrorCode;
676 WSACMSGHDR *cmsgptr;
677 DWORD ncounter;
678#endif
679
680 sctp_userspace_set_threadname("SCTP/UDP/IP4 rcv");
681
682 udprecvmbuf = malloc(sizeof(struct mbuf *) * MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN);
683
684 while (1) {
685 for (i = 0; i < to_fill; i++) {
686 /* Not getting the packet header. Tests with chain of one run
687 as usual without having the packet header.
688 Have tried both sending and receiving
689 */
690 udprecvmbuf[i] = sctp_get_mbuf_for_msg(iovlen, want_header, M_NOWAIT, want_ext, MT_DATA);
691#if !defined(_WIN32)
692 iov[i].iov_base = (caddr_t)udprecvmbuf[i]->m_data;
693 iov[i].iov_len = iovlen;
694#else
695 iov[i].buf = (caddr_t)udprecvmbuf[i]->m_data;
696 iov[i].len = iovlen;
697#endif
698 }
699 to_fill = 0;
700#if !defined(_WIN32)
701 memset(&msg, 0, sizeof(struct msghdr));
702#else
703 memset(&msg, 0, sizeof(WSAMSG));
704#endif
705 memset(&src, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
706 memset(&dst, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
707 memset(cmsgbuf, 0, sizeof(cmsgbuf));
708
709#if !defined(_WIN32)
710 msg.msg_name = (void *)&src;
711 msg.msg_namelen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
712 msg.msg_iov = iov;
713 msg.msg_iovlen = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
714 msg.msg_control = (void *)cmsgbuf;
715 msg.msg_controllen = sizeof(cmsgbuf);
716 msg.msg_flags = 0;
717
718 ncounter = n = recvmsg(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), &msg, 0);
719 if (n < 0) {
720 if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EINTR) {
721 continue;
722 } else {
723 break;
724 }
725 }
726#else
727 nResult = WSAIoctl(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), SIO_GET_EXTENSION_FUNCTION_POINTER,
728 &WSARecvMsg_GUID, sizeof WSARecvMsg_GUID,
729 &WSARecvMsg, sizeof WSARecvMsg,
730 &ncounter, NULL, NULL);
731 if (nResult == 0) {
732 msg.name = (void *)&src;
733 msg.namelen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
734 msg.lpBuffers = iov;
735 msg.dwBufferCount = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
736 msg.Control.len = sizeof ControlBuffer;
737 msg.Control.buf = ControlBuffer;
738 msg.dwFlags = 0;
739 nResult = WSARecvMsg(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), &msg, &ncounter, NULL, NULL);
740 }
741 if (nResult != 0) {
742 m_ErrorCode = WSAGetLastError();
743 if ((m_ErrorCode == WSAENOTSOCK) || (m_ErrorCode == WSAEINTR)) {
744 break;
745 }
746 continue;
747 }
748 n = ncounter;
749#endif
750 SCTP_HEADER_LEN(udprecvmbuf[0]) = n; /* length of total packet */
751 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvpackets);
752 SCTP_STAT_INCR_COUNTER64(sctps_inpackets);
753
754 if ((unsigned int)n <= iovlen) {
755 SCTP_BUF_LEN(udprecvmbuf[0]) = n;
756 (to_fill)++;
757 } else {
758 i = 0;
759 SCTP_BUF_LEN(udprecvmbuf[0]) = iovlen;
760
761 ncounter -= min(ncounter, iovlen);
762 (to_fill)++;
763 do {
764 udprecvmbuf[i]->m_next = udprecvmbuf[i+1];
765 SCTP_BUF_LEN(udprecvmbuf[i]->m_next) = min(ncounter, iovlen);
766 i++;
767 ncounter -= min(ncounter, iovlen);
768 (to_fill)++;
769 } while (ncounter > 0);
770 }
771
772 for (cmsgptr = CMSG_FIRSTHDR(&msg); cmsgptr != NULL; cmsgptr = CMSG_NXTHDR(&msg, cmsgptr)) {
773#if defined(IP_PKTINFO)
774 if ((cmsgptr->cmsg_level == IPPROTO_IP) && (cmsgptr->cmsg_type == IP_PKTINFO)) {
775 struct in_pktinfo *info;
776
777 dst.sin_family = AF_INET;
778#ifdef HAVE_SIN_LEN
779 dst.sin_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
780#endif
781 info = (struct in_pktinfo *)CMSG_DATA(cmsgptr);
782 memcpy((void *)&dst.sin_addr, (const void *)&(info->ipi_addr), sizeof(struct in_addr));
783 break;
784 }
785#else
786 if ((cmsgptr->cmsg_level == IPPROTO_IP) && (cmsgptr->cmsg_type == IP_RECVDSTADDR)) {
787 struct in_addr *addr;
788
789 dst.sin_family = AF_INET;
790#ifdef HAVE_SIN_LEN
791 dst.sin_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
792#endif
793 addr = (struct in_addr *)CMSG_DATA(cmsgptr);
794 memcpy((void *)&dst.sin_addr, (const void *)addr, sizeof(struct in_addr));
795 break;
796 }
797#endif
798 }
799
800 /* SCTP does not allow broadcasts or multicasts */
801 if (IN_MULTICAST(ntohl(dst.sin_addr.s_addr))) {
802 m_freem(udprecvmbuf[0]);
803 continue;
804 }
805 if (SCTP_IS_IT_BROADCAST(dst.sin_addr, udprecvmbuf[0])) {
806 m_freem(udprecvmbuf[0]);
807 continue;
808 }
809
810 offset = sizeof(struct sctphdr) + sizeof(struct sctp_chunkhdr);
811 if (SCTP_BUF_LEN(udprecvmbuf[0]) < offset) {
812 if ((udprecvmbuf[0] = m_pullup(udprecvmbuf[0], offset)) == NULL) {
813 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_hdrops);
814 continue;
815 }
816 }
817 sh = mtod(udprecvmbuf[0], struct sctphdr *);
818 ch = (struct sctp_chunkhdr *)((caddr_t)sh + sizeof(struct sctphdr));
819 offset -= sizeof(struct sctp_chunkhdr);
820
821 port = src.sin_port;
822 src.sin_port = sh->src_port;
823 dst.sin_port = sh->dest_port;
824 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_no_csum_on_loopback) &&
825 (src.sin_addr.s_addr == dst.sin_addr.s_addr)) {
826 compute_crc = 0;
827 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvhwcrc);
828 } else {
829 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvswcrc);
830 }
831 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "%s: Received %d bytes.", __func__, n);
832 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, " - calling sctp_common_input_processing with off=%d\n", offset);
833 sctp_common_input_processing(&udprecvmbuf[0], 0, offset, n,
834 (struct sockaddr *)&src,
835 (struct sockaddr *)&dst,
836 sh, ch,
837 compute_crc,
838 0,
839 SCTP_DEFAULT_VRFID, port);
840 if (udprecvmbuf[0]) {
841 m_freem(udprecvmbuf[0]);
842 }
843 }
844 for (i = 0; i < MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN; i++) {
845 m_free(udprecvmbuf[i]);
846 }
847 /* free the array itself */
848 free(udprecvmbuf);
849 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "%s: Exiting SCTP/UDP/IP4 rcv\n", __func__);
850 return (NULL);
851}
852#endif
853
854#if defined(INET6)
855static void *
856recv_function_udp6(void *arg)
857{
858 struct mbuf **udprecvmbuf6;
859 /*Initially the entire set of mbufs is to be allocated.
860 to_fill indicates this amount. */
861 int to_fill = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
862 /* iovlen is the size of each mbuf in the chain */
863 int i, n, offset;
864 unsigned int iovlen = MCLBYTES;
865 int want_ext = (iovlen > MLEN)? 1 : 0;
866 int want_header = 0;
867 struct sockaddr_in6 src, dst;
868 struct sctphdr *sh;
869 uint16_t port;
870 struct sctp_chunkhdr *ch;
871 char cmsgbuf[CMSG_SPACE(sizeof (struct in6_pktinfo))];
872 int compute_crc = 1;
873#if !defined(_WIN32)
874 struct iovec iov[MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN];
875 struct msghdr msg;
876 struct cmsghdr *cmsgptr;
877 unsigned int ncounter;
878#else
879 GUID WSARecvMsg_GUID = WSAID_WSARECVMSG;
880 LPFN_WSARECVMSG WSARecvMsg;
881 char ControlBuffer[1024];
882 WSABUF iov[MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN];
883 WSAMSG msg;
884 int nResult, m_ErrorCode;
885 WSACMSGHDR *cmsgptr;
886 DWORD ncounter;
887#endif
888
889 sctp_userspace_set_threadname("SCTP/UDP/IP6 rcv");
890
891 udprecvmbuf6 = malloc(sizeof(struct mbuf *) * MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN);
892 while (1) {
893 for (i = 0; i < to_fill; i++) {
894 /* Not getting the packet header. Tests with chain of one run
895 as usual without having the packet header.
896 Have tried both sending and receiving
897 */
898 udprecvmbuf6[i] = sctp_get_mbuf_for_msg(iovlen, want_header, M_NOWAIT, want_ext, MT_DATA);
899#if !defined(_WIN32)
900 iov[i].iov_base = (caddr_t)udprecvmbuf6[i]->m_data;
901 iov[i].iov_len = iovlen;
902#else
903 iov[i].buf = (caddr_t)udprecvmbuf6[i]->m_data;
904 iov[i].len = iovlen;
905#endif
906 }
907 to_fill = 0;
908
909#if !defined(_WIN32)
910 memset(&msg, 0, sizeof(struct msghdr));
911#else
912 memset(&msg, 0, sizeof(WSAMSG));
913#endif
914 memset(&src, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
915 memset(&dst, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
916 memset(cmsgbuf, 0, CMSG_SPACE(sizeof (struct in6_pktinfo)));
917
918#if !defined(_WIN32)
919 msg.msg_name = (void *)&src;
920 msg.msg_namelen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
921 msg.msg_iov = iov;
922 msg.msg_iovlen = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
923 msg.msg_control = (void *)cmsgbuf;
924 msg.msg_controllen = (socklen_t)CMSG_SPACE(sizeof (struct in6_pktinfo));
925 msg.msg_flags = 0;
926
927 ncounter = n = recvmsg(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), &msg, 0);
928 if (n < 0) {
929 if (errno == EAGAIN || errno == EINTR) {
930 continue;
931 } else {
932 break;
933 }
934 }
935#else
936 nResult = WSAIoctl(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), SIO_GET_EXTENSION_FUNCTION_POINTER,
937 &WSARecvMsg_GUID, sizeof WSARecvMsg_GUID,
938 &WSARecvMsg, sizeof WSARecvMsg,
939 &ncounter, NULL, NULL);
940 if (nResult == SOCKET_ERROR) {
941 m_ErrorCode = WSAGetLastError();
942 WSARecvMsg = NULL;
943 }
944 if (nResult == 0) {
945 msg.name = (void *)&src;
946 msg.namelen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
947 msg.lpBuffers = iov;
948 msg.dwBufferCount = MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN;
949 msg.Control.len = sizeof ControlBuffer;
950 msg.Control.buf = ControlBuffer;
951 msg.dwFlags = 0;
952 nResult = WSARecvMsg(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), &msg, &ncounter, NULL, NULL);
953 }
954 if (nResult != 0) {
955 m_ErrorCode = WSAGetLastError();
956 if ((m_ErrorCode == WSAENOTSOCK) || (m_ErrorCode == WSAEINTR)) {
957 break;
958 }
959 continue;
960 }
961 n = ncounter;
962#endif
963 SCTP_HEADER_LEN(udprecvmbuf6[0]) = n; /* length of total packet */
964 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvpackets);
965 SCTP_STAT_INCR_COUNTER64(sctps_inpackets);
966
967 if ((unsigned int)n <= iovlen) {
968 SCTP_BUF_LEN(udprecvmbuf6[0]) = n;
969 (to_fill)++;
970 } else {
971 i = 0;
972 SCTP_BUF_LEN(udprecvmbuf6[0]) = iovlen;
973
974 ncounter -= min(ncounter, iovlen);
975 (to_fill)++;
976 do {
977 udprecvmbuf6[i]->m_next = udprecvmbuf6[i+1];
978 SCTP_BUF_LEN(udprecvmbuf6[i]->m_next) = min(ncounter, iovlen);
979 i++;
980 ncounter -= min(ncounter, iovlen);
981 (to_fill)++;
982 } while (ncounter > 0);
983 }
984
985 for (cmsgptr = CMSG_FIRSTHDR(&msg); cmsgptr != NULL; cmsgptr = CMSG_NXTHDR(&msg, cmsgptr)) {
986 if ((cmsgptr->cmsg_level == IPPROTO_IPV6) && (cmsgptr->cmsg_type == IPV6_PKTINFO)) {
987 struct in6_pktinfo *info;
988
989 dst.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
990#ifdef HAVE_SIN6_LEN
991 dst.sin6_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
992#endif
993 info = (struct in6_pktinfo *)CMSG_DATA(cmsgptr);
994 /*dst.sin6_port = htons(SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_udp_tunneling_port));*/
995 memcpy((void *)&dst.sin6_addr, (const void *)&(info->ipi6_addr), sizeof(struct in6_addr));
996 }
997 }
998
999 /* SCTP does not allow broadcasts or multicasts */
1000 if (IN6_IS_ADDR_MULTICAST(&dst.sin6_addr)) {
1001 m_freem(udprecvmbuf6[0]);
1002 continue;
1003 }
1004
1005 offset = sizeof(struct sctphdr) + sizeof(struct sctp_chunkhdr);
1006 if (SCTP_BUF_LEN(udprecvmbuf6[0]) < offset) {
1007 if ((udprecvmbuf6[0] = m_pullup(udprecvmbuf6[0], offset)) == NULL) {
1008 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_hdrops);
1009 continue;
1010 }
1011 }
1012 sh = mtod(udprecvmbuf6[0], struct sctphdr *);
1013 ch = (struct sctp_chunkhdr *)((caddr_t)sh + sizeof(struct sctphdr));
1014 offset -= sizeof(struct sctp_chunkhdr);
1015
1016 port = src.sin6_port;
1017 src.sin6_port = sh->src_port;
1018 dst.sin6_port = sh->dest_port;
1019 if (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_no_csum_on_loopback) &&
1020 (memcmp(&src.sin6_addr, &dst.sin6_addr, sizeof(struct in6_addr)) == 0)) {
1021 compute_crc = 0;
1022 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvhwcrc);
1023 } else {
1024 SCTP_STAT_INCR(sctps_recvswcrc);
1025 }
1026 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "%s: Received %d bytes.", __func__, n);
1027 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, " - calling sctp_common_input_processing with off=%d\n", (int)sizeof(struct sctphdr));
1028 sctp_common_input_processing(&udprecvmbuf6[0], 0, offset, n,
1029 (struct sockaddr *)&src,
1030 (struct sockaddr *)&dst,
1031 sh, ch,
1032 compute_crc,
1033 0,
1034 SCTP_DEFAULT_VRFID, port);
1035 if (udprecvmbuf6[0]) {
1036 m_freem(udprecvmbuf6[0]);
1037 }
1038 }
1039 for (i = 0; i < MAXLEN_MBUF_CHAIN; i++) {
1040 m_free(udprecvmbuf6[i]);
1041 }
1042 /* free the array itself */
1043 free(udprecvmbuf6);
1044 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "%s: Exiting SCTP/UDP/IP6 rcv\n", __func__);
1045 return (NULL);
1046}
1047#endif
1048
1049#if defined(_WIN32)
1050static void
1051setReceiveBufferSize(SOCKET sfd, int new_size)
1052#else
1053static void
1054setReceiveBufferSize(int sfd, int new_size)
1055#endif
1056{
1057 int ch = new_size;
1058
1059 if (setsockopt (sfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF, (void*)&ch, sizeof(ch)) < 0) {
1060#if defined(_WIN32)
1061 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set recv-buffers size (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1062#else
1063 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set recv-buffers size (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1064#endif
1065 }
1066 return;
1067}
1068
1069#if defined(_WIN32)
1070static void
1071setSendBufferSize(SOCKET sfd, int new_size)
1072#else
1073static void
1074setSendBufferSize(int sfd, int new_size)
1075#endif
1076{
1077 int ch = new_size;
1078
1079 if (setsockopt (sfd, SOL_SOCKET, SO_SNDBUF, (void*)&ch, sizeof(ch)) < 0) {
1080#if defined(_WIN32)
1081 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set send-buffers size (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1082#else
1083 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set send-buffers size (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1084#endif
1085 }
1086 return;
1087}
1088
1089#define SOCKET_TIMEOUT 100 /* in ms */
1090void
1091recv_thread_init(void)
1092{
1093#if defined(INET)
1094 struct sockaddr_in addr_ipv4;
1095 const int hdrincl = 1;
1096#endif
1097#if defined(INET6)
1098 struct sockaddr_in6 addr_ipv6;
1099#endif
1100#if defined(INET) || defined(INET6)
1101 const int on = 1;
1102#endif
1103#if !defined(_WIN32)
1104 struct timeval timeout;
1105
1106 memset(&timeout, 0, sizeof(struct timeval));
1107 timeout.tv_sec = (SOCKET_TIMEOUT / 1000);
1108 timeout.tv_usec = (SOCKET_TIMEOUT % 1000) * 1000;
1109#else
1110 unsigned int timeout = SOCKET_TIMEOUT; /* Timeout in milliseconds */
1111#endif
1112#if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__DragonFly__) || defined(__FreeBSD__)
1113 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) == -1) {
1114 if ((SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) = socket(AF_ROUTE, SOCK_RAW, 0)) == -1) {
1115 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create routing socket (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1116 }
1117#if 0
1118 struct sockaddr_nl sanl;
1119
1120 if ((SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) = socket(AF_NETLINK, SOCK_RAW, NETLINK_ROUTE)) < 0) {
1121 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create routing socket (errno = %d.\n", errno);
1122 }
1123 memset(&sanl, 0, sizeof(sanl));
1124 sanl.nl_family = AF_NETLINK;
1125 sanl.nl_groups = 0;
1126#ifdef INET
1127 sanl.nl_groups |= RTMGRP_IPV4_IFADDR;
1128#endif
1129#ifdef INET6
1130 sanl.nl_groups |= RTMGRP_IPV6_IFADDR;
1131#endif
1132 if (bind(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route), (struct sockaddr *) &sanl, sizeof(sanl)) < 0) {
1133 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind routing socket (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1134 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route));
1135 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) = -1;
1136 }
1137#endif
1138 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) != -1) {
1139 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route), SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO,(const void*)&timeout, sizeof(struct timeval)) < 0) {
1140 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on routing socket (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1141#if defined(_WIN32)
1142 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route));
1143#else
1144 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route));
1145#endif
1146 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) = -1;
1147 }
1148 }
1149 }
1150#endif
1151#if defined(INET)
1152 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) == -1) {
1153 if ((SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_RAW, IPPROTO_SCTP)) == -1) {
1154#if defined(_WIN32)
1155 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create raw socket for IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1156#else
1157 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create raw socket for IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1158#endif
1159 } else {
1160 /* complete setting up the raw SCTP socket */
1161 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp), IPPROTO_IP, IP_HDRINCL,(const void*)&hdrincl, sizeof(int)) < 0) {
1162#if defined(_WIN32)
1163 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IP_HDRINCL (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1164 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1165#else
1166 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IP_HDRINCL (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1167 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1168#endif
1169 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) = -1;
1170 } else if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp), SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, (const void *)&timeout, sizeof(timeout)) < 0) {
1171#if defined(_WIN32)
1172 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on socket for SCTP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1173 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1174#else
1175 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on socket for SCTP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1176 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1177#endif
1178 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) = -1;
1179 } else {
1180 memset((void *)&addr_ipv4, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
1181#ifdef HAVE_SIN_LEN
1182 addr_ipv4.sin_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
1183#endif
1184 addr_ipv4.sin_family = AF_INET;
1185 addr_ipv4.sin_port = htons(0);
1186 addr_ipv4.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
1187 if (bind(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp), (const struct sockaddr *)&addr_ipv4, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in)) < 0) {
1188#if defined(_WIN32)
1189 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind socket for SCTP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1190 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1191#else
1192 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind socket for SCTP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1193 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1194#endif
1195 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) = -1;
1196 } else {
1197 setReceiveBufferSize(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp), SB_RAW); /* 128K */
1198 setSendBufferSize(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp), SB_RAW); /* 128K Is this setting net.inet.raw.maxdgram value? Should it be set to 64K? */
1199 }
1200 }
1201 }
1202 }
1203 if ((SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) == -1) && (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_udp_tunneling_port) != 0)) {
1204 if ((SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, IPPROTO_UDP)) == -1) {
1205#if defined(_WIN32)
1206 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1207#else
1208 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1209#endif
1210 } else {
1211#if defined(IP_PKTINFO)
1212 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), IPPROTO_IP, IP_PKTINFO, (const void *)&on, (int)sizeof(int)) < 0) {
1213#else
1214 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), IPPROTO_IP, IP_RECVDSTADDR, (const void *)&on, (int)sizeof(int)) < 0) {
1215#endif
1216#if defined(_WIN32)
1217#if defined(IP_PKTINFO)
1218 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IP_PKTINFO on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1219#else
1220 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IP_RECVDSTADDR on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1221#endif
1222 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1223#else
1224#if defined(IP_PKTINFO)
1225 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IP_PKTINFO on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1226#else
1227 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IP_RECVDSTADDR on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1228#endif
1229 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1230#endif
1231 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) = -1;
1232 } else if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, (const void *)&timeout, sizeof(timeout)) < 0) {
1233#if defined(_WIN32)
1234 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1235 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1236#else
1237 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1238 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1239#endif
1240 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) = -1;
1241 } else {
1242 memset((void *)&addr_ipv4, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
1243#ifdef HAVE_SIN_LEN
1244 addr_ipv4.sin_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
1245#endif
1246 addr_ipv4.sin_family = AF_INET;
1247 addr_ipv4.sin_port = htons(SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_udp_tunneling_port));
1248 addr_ipv4.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(INADDR_ANY);
1249 if (bind(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), (const struct sockaddr *)&addr_ipv4, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in)) < 0) {
1250#if defined(_WIN32)
1251 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1252 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1253#else
1254 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv4 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1255 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1256#endif
1257 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) = -1;
1258 } else {
1259 setReceiveBufferSize(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), SB_RAW); /* 128K */
1260 setSendBufferSize(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp), SB_RAW); /* 128K Is this setting net.inet.raw.maxdgram value? Should it be set to 64K? */
1261 }
1262 }
1263 }
1264 }
1265#endif
1266#if defined(INET6)
1267 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) == -1) {
1268 if ((SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) = socket(AF_INET6, SOCK_RAW, IPPROTO_SCTP)) == -1) {
1269#if defined(_WIN32)
1270 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1271#else
1272 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1273#endif
1274 } else {
1275 /* complete setting up the raw SCTP socket */
1276#if defined(IPV6_RECVPKTINFO)
1277 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_RECVPKTINFO, (const void *)&on, sizeof(on)) < 0) {
1278#if defined(_WIN32)
1279 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_RECVPKTINFO on socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1280 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1281#else
1282 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_RECVPKTINFO on socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1283 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1284#endif
1285 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) = -1;
1286 } else {
1287#else
1288 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_PKTINFO,(const void*)&on, sizeof(on)) < 0) {
1289#if defined(_WIN32)
1290 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_PKTINFO on socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1291 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1292#else
1293 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_PKTINFO on socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1294 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1295#endif
1296 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) = -1;
1297 } else {
1298#endif
1299 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_V6ONLY, (const void*)&on, (socklen_t)sizeof(on)) < 0) {
1300#if defined(_WIN32)
1301 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_V6ONLY on socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1302#else
1303 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_V6ONLY on socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1304#endif
1305 }
1306 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, (const void *)&timeout, sizeof(timeout)) < 0) {
1307#if defined(_WIN32)
1308 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1309 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1310#else
1311 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1312 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1313#endif
1314 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) = -1;
1315 } else {
1316 memset((void *)&addr_ipv6, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
1317#ifdef HAVE_SIN6_LEN
1318 addr_ipv6.sin6_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
1319#endif
1320 addr_ipv6.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
1321 addr_ipv6.sin6_port = htons(0);
1322 addr_ipv6.sin6_addr = in6addr_any;
1323 if (bind(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), (const struct sockaddr *)&addr_ipv6, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6)) < 0) {
1324#if defined(_WIN32)
1325 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1326 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1327#else
1328 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind socket for SCTP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1329 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1330#endif
1331 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) = -1;
1332 } else {
1333 setReceiveBufferSize(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), SB_RAW); /* 128K */
1334 setSendBufferSize(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6), SB_RAW); /* 128K Is this setting net.inet.raw.maxdgram value? Should it be set to 64K? */
1335 }
1336 }
1337 }
1338 }
1339 }
1340 if ((SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) == -1) && (SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_udp_tunneling_port) != 0)) {
1341 if ((SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) = socket(AF_INET6, SOCK_DGRAM, IPPROTO_UDP)) == -1) {
1342#if defined(_WIN32)
1343 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1344#else
1345 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't create socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1346#endif
1347 }
1348#if defined(IPV6_RECVPKTINFO)
1349 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_RECVPKTINFO, (const void *)&on, (int)sizeof(int)) < 0) {
1350#if defined(_WIN32)
1351 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_RECVPKTINFO on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1352 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1353#else
1354 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_RECVPKTINFO on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1355 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1356#endif
1357 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) = -1;
1358 } else {
1359#else
1360 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_PKTINFO, (const void *)&on, (int)sizeof(int)) < 0) {
1361#if defined(_WIN32)
1362 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_PKTINFO on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1363 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1364#else
1365 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_PKTINFO on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1366 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1367#endif
1368 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) = -1;
1369 } else {
1370#endif
1371 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), IPPROTO_IPV6, IPV6_V6ONLY, (const void *)&on, (socklen_t)sizeof(on)) < 0) {
1372#if defined(_WIN32)
1373 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_V6ONLY on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1374#else
1375 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set IPV6_V6ONLY on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1376#endif
1377 }
1378 if (setsockopt(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVTIMEO, (const void *)&timeout, sizeof(timeout)) < 0) {
1379#if defined(_WIN32)
1380 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1381 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1382#else
1383 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't set timeout on socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1384 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1385#endif
1386 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) = -1;
1387 } else {
1388 memset((void *)&addr_ipv6, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6));
1389#ifdef HAVE_SIN6_LEN
1390 addr_ipv6.sin6_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6);
1391#endif
1392 addr_ipv6.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
1393 addr_ipv6.sin6_port = htons(SCTP_BASE_SYSCTL(sctp_udp_tunneling_port));
1394 addr_ipv6.sin6_addr = in6addr_any;
1395 if (bind(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), (const struct sockaddr *)&addr_ipv6, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in6)) < 0) {
1396#if defined(_WIN32)
1397 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", WSAGetLastError());
1398 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1399#else
1400 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't bind socket for SCTP/UDP/IPv6 (errno = %d).\n", errno);
1401 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1402#endif
1403 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) = -1;
1404 } else {
1405 setReceiveBufferSize(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), SB_RAW); /* 128K */
1406 setSendBufferSize(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6), SB_RAW); /* 128K Is this setting net.inet.raw.maxdgram value? Should it be set to 64K? */
1407 }
1408 }
1409 }
1410 }
1411#endif
1412#if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__DragonFly__) || defined(__FreeBSD__)
1413#if defined(INET) || defined(INET6)
1414 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) != -1) {
1415 int rc;
1416
1417 if ((rc = sctp_userspace_thread_create(&SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadroute), &recv_function_route))) {
1418 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't start routing thread (%d).\n", rc);
1419 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route));
1420 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) = -1;
1421 }
1422 }
1423#endif
1424#endif
1425#if defined(INET)
1426 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) != -1) {
1427 int rc;
1428
1429 if ((rc = sctp_userspace_thread_create(&SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadraw), &recv_function_raw))) {
1430 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't start SCTP/IPv4 recv thread (%d).\n", rc);
1431#if defined(_WIN32)
1432 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1433#else
1434 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1435#endif
1436 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) = -1;
1437 }
1438 }
1439 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) != -1) {
1440 int rc;
1441
1442 if ((rc = sctp_userspace_thread_create(&SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadudp), &recv_function_udp))) {
1443 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't start SCTP/UDP/IPv4 recv thread (%d).\n", rc);
1444#if defined(_WIN32)
1445 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1446#else
1447 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1448#endif
1449 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) = -1;
1450 }
1451 }
1452#endif
1453#if defined(INET6)
1454 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) != -1) {
1455 int rc;
1456
1457 if ((rc = sctp_userspace_thread_create(&SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadraw6), &recv_function_raw6))) {
1458 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't start SCTP/IPv6 recv thread (%d).\n", rc);
1459#if defined(_WIN32)
1460 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1461#else
1462 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1463#endif
1464 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) = -1;
1465 }
1466 }
1467 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) != -1) {
1468 int rc;
1469
1470 if ((rc = sctp_userspace_thread_create(&SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadudp6), &recv_function_udp6))) {
1471 SCTPDBG(SCTP_DEBUG_USR, "Can't start SCTP/UDP/IPv6 recv thread (%d).\n", rc);
1472#if defined(_WIN32)
1473 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1474#else
1475 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1476#endif
1477 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) = -1;
1478 }
1479 }
1480#endif
1481}
1482
1483void
1484recv_thread_destroy(void)
1485{
1486#if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__DragonFly__) || defined(__FreeBSD__)
1487#if defined(INET) || defined(INET6)
1488 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route) != -1) {
1489 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_route));
1490 pthread_join(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadroute), NULL);
1491 }
1492#endif
1493#endif
1494#if defined(INET)
1495 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) != -1) {
1496#if defined(_WIN32)
1497 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1498 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) = -1;
1499 WaitForSingleObject(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadraw), INFINITE);
1500 CloseHandle(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadraw));
1501#else
1502 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp));
1503 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp) = -1;
1504 pthread_join(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadraw), NULL);
1505#endif
1506 }
1507 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) != -1) {
1508#if defined(_WIN32)
1509 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1510 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) = -1;
1511 WaitForSingleObject(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadudp), INFINITE);
1512 CloseHandle(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadudp));
1513#else
1514 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp));
1515 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp) = -1;
1516 pthread_join(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadudp), NULL);
1517#endif
1518 }
1519#endif
1520#if defined(INET6)
1521 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) != -1) {
1522#if defined(_WIN32)
1523 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1524 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) = -1;
1525 WaitForSingleObject(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadraw6), INFINITE);
1526 CloseHandle(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadraw6));
1527#else
1528 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6));
1529 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_rawsctp6) = -1;
1530 pthread_join(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadraw6), NULL);
1531#endif
1532 }
1533 if (SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) != -1) {
1534#if defined(_WIN32)
1535 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) = -1;
1536 closesocket(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1537 WaitForSingleObject(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadudp6), INFINITE);
1538 CloseHandle(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadudp6));
1539#else
1540 close(SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6));
1541 SCTP_BASE_VAR(userspace_udpsctp6) = -1;
1542 pthread_join(SCTP_BASE_VAR(recvthreadudp6), NULL);
1543#endif
1544 }
1545#endif
1546}
1547#else
1548int foo;
1549#endif
